page.title: 10THE FIRE SERVICE
page.content: Compared to other major towns and cities, Worksop has a low incident rate for fires. There are fewer firemen working in Worksop because there are not so many large fires expected. From the fireman's point of view the people of Worksop are quite friendly. Most fires in Worksop are caused by human negligence. The Worksop fire station is manned 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. There are 34 people working at the station, 17 retained officers, one sub-officer, three leading fire-officers and 13 firemen.
